snippet.title: Kingdom Wars 4 - Plague Early Access Trailer
snippet.description: In a time of plague and war, it's your task to lead your people through the deadliest pandemics in history. In this historical grand strategy and RTS hybrid, you play as a minor lord or a king of a great nation across medieval Europe, Africa or Middle East.
